short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The AXON Pixel Helper helps you to debug and validate your Pixel installation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AXON Pixel Helper helps you to debug and validate your Pixel installation. It allows you to see the events your site produces and the payloads of those events, and it flags those that are incorrect. You can find complete instructions on how to use this extension at https://developers.applovin.com/en/audience-plus/pixel-validation.
